Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: DJ SLOT ONE
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: DJ Slot 1
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: DJ Slot One

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: DJ SLOT TWO
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: DJ SET TWO
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: DJ Set Two

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: My First Furry Con
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: We know for a lot of you, this is your first furry convention... so... how do you go about preparing for the convention and what to do AT the convention? Our entertainments manager will give you a handy little guide on what to expect!
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *Welfare will be available as well for you to ask questions. No question is stupid, and don't feel shy, the crew are all friendly - Frankie*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Opening Ceremony
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Our ship's captain, Jasper Foxx, and second officer Anthropuppy will be launching the space ship Furcation. Here, you will meet this year's charity, meet the venue, and we'll have some important information on this year's event.
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *This will be in both the main deck and the secondary deck. This is to make sure everybody can see it. It doesn't matter which one you're in, everyone will be involved! - Clive*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Furcation Karaoke
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: You asked for a longer karaoke? So, how about three and a half hours? Ulfer, Starfire and GShep will be on hand to carry the night, and for you to sing the night away!
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *We know everyone hates their own voice, but the whole idea is to have fun. Also, we will be happy to let duets and even trios happening this year! Come and join in the fun! - Frankie*

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Opening Ceremony
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: Our ship's captain, Jasper Foxx, and second officer Anthropuppy will be launching the space ship Furcation. Here, you will meet this year's charity, meet the venue, and we'll have some important information on this year's event.
Second Deck (Marquee).description: *This will be in both the main deck and the secondary deck. This is to make sure everybody can see it. It doesn't matter which one you're in, everyone will be involved! - Clive*

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Undefined
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: Undefined

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Board And Social Game Corner
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: This is where you can chill with your friends, play board games, or generally socialise! The space is yours!... See what we did there?!

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: The Cargo Hold
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: This is where our awesome dealers will be selling their stuff. Sprawled out over both event spaces, make sure that you check both out! Take your time and browse at your leisure.
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *Back by popular demand, the one way system will be in place... Sorry, Jack, please don't bap my ears! - Clive*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Meet The Charity
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Casper will be here with this year's charity, Coventry Small Animal Rescue, to discuss what they do, you can ask questions, and discover who we are raising money for.
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *Nothing's confirmed yet, but we may be able to get some of the animals too... **MAYBE**... Remember the dogs from last year? They were so adorable! - Frankie*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Fursuit Games
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Our usual fursuit games are back! We've revamped it a bit to make it friendly for everyone. Even if you don't have a fursuit, you can join in the fun!
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *This will be done in teams, and the losing team captain has to do a forfeit... dun dun duuuuuuuuuun! - Frankie*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Ship's Crew Test
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Are you capable of joining the crew? Well, this year's quiz will see if you are capable of navigating this ship. We'll try to make the questions easy as possible, but make sure to bring the big brains.
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *Quizzes are my big thing, I'm really really good at them. I know Frankie hates them but, if you have me on your team, you're a winner! - Clive*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Furcation Agony Aunt
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Are you a weary space traveler facing personal dilemmas amidst the vastness of the cosmos? Are the challenges of a futuristic world weighing you down? Fear not, for we have a groundbreaking solution that merges the finest of human empathy with the cutting-edge advancements of technology, introducing Our Galactic Duo: Counsellor Cat and holographic Doctor Dog
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *This is a new thing for Furcation this year, we've been told it's really funny. However, we've been asked to warn you... this event IS for mature audiences and some poking fun will happen... So... please bear that in mind if you come along! - Frankie*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Fox Amoore and Jake Concert
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Fox Amoore and Jake are back with us this year to do a concert for everyone. Come and say hello, as well as listen along to some amazing music performed LIVE at Furcation.
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *Last year, this was really popular. We're going to make sure we have more seats this year, but make sure you get in early if you want to ensure to get a seat! - Clive*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Saturday DJ 1 - Gothicat
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Gothicat's with us again this year! For those of you that like cheesy rock, disney music, and just... well... rock in general, this is where you need to come to hang out!
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *I can't wait to rock out again this year, always love this DJ set myself! - Frankie*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Saturday DJ 2
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: TBC

Second Deck (Marquee).title: The Cargo Hold
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: This is where our awesome dealers will be selling their stuff. Sprawled out over both event spaces, make sure that you check both out! Take your time and browse at your leisure.
Second Deck (Marquee).description: *Back by popular demand, the one way system will be in place... Sorry, Jack, please don't bap my ears! - Clive*

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Non-Binary and Trans Meetup
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: Gothicat is hosting this year's safe space for our non-binary and trans friends to meet up and discuss things together. At Furcation, we aim to be welcoming to all.

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Rocket League Tournament
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: This year, our Rocket League tournament will be going ahead. See who's the best player in space, as well as on Earth!

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Pup Meet and Pup 101
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: In our efforts to be welcoming to our Pup friends, our Pup meet returns. Hosted by Crofty, Joey and Mysticporo, here is where you can 'pup out' and be yourself. If you are new to the scene, there will also be a 101 on how to get the most out of it.

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Suits And Props
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: Dutch will be taking you on the best way to get the most out of suits, as well as props that you can use to make the most out of as well!

Second Deck (Marquee).title: TikTok Furs
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: Aries is back with us for another year for a meetup of all the furries who use TikTok, and how to get the most out of it if you want to start now.

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Casino Night
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: Fancy a flutter? The Furcation Casino Night makes a return for another year, using the bigger space due to how busy it was last year! *NOTE: No real money is used to play this, and you will not win real money either. This is purely for fun.*

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Bring Your Own Popcorn
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: What space theme would be complete without a Sci-Fi movie night? Bring your own popcorn and (non-alcoholic) drinks and come and enjoy a couple of space themed movies together. (You can even come just in your PJ's if you want, just... dress appropriately, please!!!)

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: So, You Want To Run A Furry Convention?
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: With the amount of furries growing in our community, this panel shows you the legalities, the fun stuff, and the ACTUAL fun stuff on how to run your own furry convention.
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *This event seems to be surprisingly popular! I can't wait to see what other conventions pop up from this! - Clive*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Furcation Photoshoot And Walk
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: This year's big photo will take place in the marquee. After that, we will be doing our walk around the park. Don't worry, we'll be looking around the route first before we set you loose!
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *If you're a photographer, here's your chance to see all the fluffballs of Furcation 2023, and we don't just mean the fursuiters. - Frankie*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Improvisation Deck
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Rememeber Whose Line Is It Anyway? (Entertainments manager showing his age here...) No? Well, everyone knows how to improvise and act off-the-cuff. This event will show you how to do it, and have some fun games along the way for you to join in.
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *The last time we did an improvisation event was in 2018, so it's good to see it back! Just, please be kind with your suggestions! - Clive*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Furcation Dance Competition
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: You all have asked for this for years... We can finally announce... This year's Furcation Dance Competition! Whether you are a veteran of dance, or just want to strut your stuff, everybody is welcome to try! Guest judges will pick the best dancer from both fursuiters and non-fursuiters!
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *Dance competitions are huge at furry conventions, so it's time we had our turn. This is all for fun though, but even technically skilled dancers can join in. - Frankie*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Hungry Hippos
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Does anybody remember the board game Hungry Hippos? Now... imagine that... on a much larger scale. Two competitions will run, fursuits and non-fursuits, so anyone can join in!
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *We always seem to be missing some of the balls every year after this event... Makes me wonder which of the canines are stealing them and hiding them! - Frankie*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Charity Auction
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: This year's charity auction event. Last year's was massive, and we intend to do the same this year, where we hope to raise a lot of money for this year's charity.
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *Pot Noodles? Toilet paper? Even a pineapple?! What next will be in our auction list this year... Actually, I shouldn't ask! - Clive*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Closing Ceremony
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: All good things must come down to Earth, and this includes our space ship Furcation. Our captain will be de-briefing the crew, as well as giving some very exciting up and coming news about future years.
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *We've got some big announcements to make during the closing ceremony. Again, on the main deck or secondary deck, nobody will miss out on the fun! - Frankie*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: DJ SLOT 5
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: TBC

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Farewell Dance
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Ulfer Wolfy will be the last set before we say goodbye to you all for another year for those leaving us on Monday morning. Playing boppy dance and the usual cheesy music that fursuiters seem to like for some reason!
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *And, of course, we're gonna try for a huge conga, again. Can't forget that! - Frankie*

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Furcation Photoshoot And Walk
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: This year's big photo will take place in the marquee. After that, we will be doing our walk around the park. Don't worry, we'll be looking around the route first before we set you loose!
Second Deck (Marquee).description: *If you're a photographer, here's your chance to see all the fluffballs of Furcation 2023, and we don't just mean the fursuiters. - Frankie*

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Photography 101
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: After the photoshoot, our photography team will be on hand to show you budding photographers how to make the most of your snaps.

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Furcation Dance Competition
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract:
You all have asked for this for years... We can finally announce... This year's Furcation Dance Competition! Whether you are a veteran of dance, or just want to strut your stuff, everybody is welcome to try! Guest judges will pick the best dancer from both fursuiters and non-fursuiters!

NOTE: This will be the overflow viewing space if the Main Deck gets too full, or you don't want to be overwhelmed by the crowds.
Second Deck (Marquee).description: *Dance competitions are huge at furry conventions, so it's time we had our turn. This is all for fun though, but even technically skilled dancers can join in. - Frankie*

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Asexual Meet
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: Another one of our meetups in Furcation's efforts to be all-inclusive. This meet is for you asexual furries to meet and discuss things in a safe space, together. Allys are also welcome.

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Undefined
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: Undefined

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Undefined
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: Undefined

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Closing Ceremony
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: All good things must come down to Earth, and this includes our space ship Furcation. Our captain will be de-briefing the crew, as well as giving some very exciting up and coming news about future years.
Second Deck (Marquee).description: *We've got some big announcements to make during the closing ceremony. Again, on the main deck or secondary deck, nobody will miss out on the fun! - Frankie*

Second Deck (Marquee).title: Board And Social Game Corner
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: This is where you can chill with your friends, play board games, or generally socialise! The space is yours!... See what we did there?!

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: Furcation Feedback Panel
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: Furcation take on all of your constructive feedback to make our convention better for you. This is your chance to do it. The heads of all the various departments will be there too to take your feedback as well. (**NOTE** - This event may overrun depending on the feedback we get!)
Main Deck (Clubhouse).description: *If you have something constructive you'd like to see in Furcation, this is the place to do it. - Clive*

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: DJ SLOT 7 LD
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: TBC

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: DJ SLOT 8 LD
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: TBC

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: DJ SLOT 9 LD

Main Deck (Clubhouse).title: DJ SLOT 10 LD
Main Deck (Clubhouse).abstract: TBC

Second Deck (Marquee).title: All Day Chillout Zone
Second Deck (Marquee).abstract: There will be no events taking place in the marquee today, so you can use it to chill out, play board games, or just socialise with your friends!
